SEARCH
Module PIXL.POS
Package teampixl.com.pixlpos.database.api

Class OrderAPI

java.lang.Object
teampixl.com.pixlpos.database.api.OrderAPI
public class OrderAPI extends Object
The OrderAPI class is responsible for managing orders. It provides methods to create, read, update, and delete orders, with robust validation and error handling.

    • reloadOrders

      public void reloadOrders()
      Updates memory with the latest orders from the database. This also prevents memory leaks. This method should be called when restoring state after large order loads.

    • getOrderItemsById

      public Map<MenuItem,Integer> getOrderItemsById(String ORDER_ID)

      Parameters:
      ORDER_ID - the order ID
      Returns:
      a map of MenuItem objects and their quantities

    • initializeOrder

      public Order initializeOrder()
      Initializes a new order for a user. If the user already has a pending order for today, it returns that order.
      Returns:
      the initialized Order object
